pages.text: The $(thing)Elemental Catalyzer$() is an augment that increases the amount of Redstone Flux a $(l:mods_thermalexpansion/reactant_dynamo)Reactant dynamo$() generates from reactions between elemental fluids and dusts. When installed, the dynamo will quintuple (x5) maximum power output and increase RF per reaction by 25%. However, it will only accept elemental reactions, such as $(item)Blazing Pyrotheum$() with $(item)Cryotheum Dust$().
